main event: A 15-year-old boy observed a circular, bright white object traveling from east to west at varying speeds for about 30 seconds on 30 July 1952.
interesting points: The object disappeared into the clouds after the observation., Descriptions of the object included references to its circular shape and bright white color., The observer's reliability is considered excellent., Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings in the area., The sighting was initially attributed to a possible balloon despite inconclusive evidence.
